DOC.brief_summary: This validation study compare propose field collection method gold standard collection technique microbiome analysis stool breast milk sample .
DOC.detailed_description: In order conduct future study gut microbiome population live rural , low income setting , validation study conduct verify validity propose field collection method stool breast milk sample . We compare microbial diversity abundance biologic sample use various propose field collection method immediately frozen sample . The proposed field collection method feasible use community-based study low income setting limited access cold storage .
